divs: Sighting Details1. heading west on chestnut @ 2nd ave. on my way home from work. 2.it was very bright and moving in a starlit night sky. ( i know what a meteorite looks like) 3.aircraft or meteorite. 4.about the size of a pea taped to the inside of the windsheild,very bright blue green no tail or trail moving in a straight line to the n.w. it seemed to be gaining altitude and speed. 5.driving my car stopped in the middle of the road,tried to point it out to another person (passenger) but they missed it was gone in about 4 seconds 6.it was up and out of sight quickly not sure where it went tried to relocate but it was gone
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Terre Haute
There were no other sightings in Terre Haute on or around June 17th 2006
Summary: lbright blue-green object "light' traveled north - west at extreme velocity, seemed to be gaining altitude.1
